name: Rhonda Patrick Protocol
description: Evidence-focused longevity approach by biomedical scientist Rhonda Patrick PhD (FoundMyFitness). Emphasizes micronutrient optimization, sulforaphane, omega-3, vitamin D, sauna, and exercise. Focuses on nutrient adequacy, genetic polymorphisms (e.g., MTHFR), and hormesis.

dosage.standard: Sulforaphane (moringa/sprouts), Omega-3 (2-4g), Vitamin D (4000-5000 IU), Sauna 4x/week
dosage.range: Personalized based on genetics and blood work
dosage.notes: Strong emphasis on food-first approach. Smoothie with diverse micronutrients. Genetic testing to identify vulnerabilities. FoundMyFitness.com for latest protocols.

keyFindings: Omega-3 index >8% associated with 5-year longer life expectancy
Sulforaphane activates Nrf2 â€” upregulates hundreds of protective genes
sideEffects: Time and cost of comprehensive testing
